body:
The Ministry of Justice (MoJ) does regular research to find out how people use our existing services and what they need from new services.  This helps us create services that work better for government and for the public.

This research is on behalf of the Ministry of Justice and other organisations that are a part of it, including the Office of the Public Guardian (OPG), Legal Aid Agency (LAA), Criminal Injuries Compensation Authority (CICA) and Her Majesty's Prison and Probation Service (HMPPS).

Please read these statements and sign at the bottom if you agree. If you have any questions, please ask.
heading: User Research consent form
lede: Thank you for agreeing to participate in this research.
